author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
With many virtual reality headsets available today, ranging from the Quest 3 to the Vision Pro, advances in dedicated PCVR hardware seems to be more iterative than groundbreaking. We test and compare two radically different approaches to PCVR design: the ultra light Bigscreen Beyond 2 and the feature-packed Somnium VR1. Here are the specs that we actually think matter for gaming, and why the ideal headset is so hard to get right. 

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks
